body.name: Flush Mount LED Ceiling Light Fixture, 3CCT 3000K/4000K/5000K Selectable Dimmable Modern Kitchen Recessed Ceiling Lamp, 15W 1200Lm 7 Inch Closet Round Super Slim for Living Room, Dining Room(Set of 2)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 39 mins
FREE pickup Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【Energy Saving & Dimmable】This LED ceiling light is only 15W, yet has an output brightness of 1200LM. That means we use lower wattage, but higher brightness output to help you make your monthly electricity bill lower and lower - our ceiling light saves almost 90% of energy compared to traditional lamps. In addition, our flush mount ceiling light uses an advanced dimming chip that ensures smooth dimming without flicker or buzz, so our light is very friendly to your eyes. (Dimmer not included)

【Super Reliable & Durable Material】Our ceiling lamp is made of high quality plastic, you don't need to worry about it fading, rusting or corroding as time goes by. The surface of the light is designed to be enclosed, which makes it dust-proof and easy to clean. Our LED flush mount ceiling light is sturdy, durable, long-lasting and very safe to use - which is expected to provide a lifetime up to 30,000 hours, which more than 27 years at a standard usage time(3 hrs per day).

【Ultra-thin & Wide Application】We designed this ceiling LED light with simple but not boring lines and super slim body, it can increase the modern and stylish charm to your house. Our 7 inch flush mount fixture has a thickness of only 0.8 inches, which is very perfect for low profile. This LED light fixture is also suitable for kitchen, bedroom, hallway, living room, closet, stairway, restaurant, hotel, office and so on!

【Easy Installation】Our ceiling light fixture is hardwired and no assembly required. With a slide and lock design mounting plate, the low profile ceiling light fits most Junction Boxes, making installation easy and secure. Besides, the package includes all the mounting accessories and step-by-step instructions, so you can easily get a beautiful improvement to your home in just a few minutes.

【Worry-free to Buy】This round LED ceiling light makes a thoughtful gift for a your friend or loved one who needs a extra light. The high quality non-flammable plastic cover prevents electrical shorts caused by electrocution, leakage and other potential disaster risks. If you have any problems, we are glad to provide help. We care about every feedback and cherish every opportunity to give you a perfect shopping experience!
body.description: Are you tired of lights that are hard to install and cost you a lot of time?Are you looking for a ceiling light that doesn't require much space?Can you no longer stand the flickering and buzzing lights?Are you frustrated with the high bill of electricity you spend on lighting?Then, Brightever LED Flush Mount Ceiling Light Fixture is the ideal choice for you!·This dimmable ceiling light is only 0.8 inch thick, making it perfect for low profile areas. With a dust-proof surface, it takes the hassle out of your daily cleaning.·Thanks to the high quality LED chips that provide plenty of even, flicker-free light (up to 1200LM), this close to ceiling light fixture is bright and protects your eyes from glare for your everyday use.·This flush mount light fixture combines a minimalist design and the clean lines, adding a minimalist and modern appeal that matches most styles of decoration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive. Easy to install. Perfect brightness for the closet.
reviews.reviewText: Guests were coming in a few hours. The fixture in the closet stopped working. I had amazon deliver this, unboxed it, took down the old fixture (you know to turn off the power, right?) and replaced it with this one. I looked great and provides the perfect amount of light for the walk-in closet.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic light we put it in the closet.I love how thin it is yet it gives off a lot of light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Coat closet needed light. Easy to install, adequate light for entire space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars bright and easy to install.
reviews.reviewText: I used the light over the kitchen sink. Very easy to install and perfect for my use.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to mount and looks great
reviews.reviewText: Easy to mount on existing electrical box. Very bright and great finish.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great light fixture!
reviews.reviewText: Great light fixture an very easy to install. I would highly recommend for a small area such as a closet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Item received as described
reviews.reviewText: Lights are pure day light. Not yellowish. Very nice and bright.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great for high ceilings but can be harsh depending on the setting. At first, it was startling bright but once I got adapted it was great for our application. I replaced a recessed lighting fixture so, this mounts almost flush to the ceiling.

reviews.reviewTitle: expensive ... probably find cheaper if you look around.
reviews.reviewText: Be careful twisting the lamp on to the bracket. Don't force it because it's plastic and if you break off one of the tabs you are hooped. then you need gorilla glue.
